email.subject: A job offer
email.body:
Hey #PLAYERNAME#!
Congrats with your new IBM PC! Jim told me about you and your past experiences as a hacker with your old IMSAI 8080!
Did you REALLY send your computer password to Jim? That is a big no-no in computer security - never do that again!
I'm a little bit of a "hacker" myself, hehe.
Maybe we have a job offer for you? If you are interested, take a look at our server - I have setup an account for you! We have some helpfull articles on there too.
We have developed a "PortHack"-tool (and many other port-cracking tools) that can crack ANY password if the ports on the target computer is open!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------ DOWNLOAD ALL the "tools" AND the "password_list.txt" from our "Tech Lab" server and reply back - IF you WANT the job! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Otherwise, just forget I send you this email... BTW, Jim doesn't know I have contacted you. This is our little secret, okay?!
Sincerely, - Malvin
Seattle Tech Lab
